column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If you want a Chicago deep dish pizza with a local unpretentious crowd
column2: this is it! We got there around 4 it was very mellow. We ordered a salad and pizza for two and the portions were more than enough. The crunchy crust was my favorite
column3: and the toppings tasted fresh. If you're an out of towner
column4: this is the place to try. The walls were decorated in sports memorabilia and tv's. You'll feel relaxed and at home.
